name: Wild West: Explore Shoot Trade
description:
Wild West: Explore Shoot Trade is a completely new tycoon game with exciting shooting battle as core gameplay. Hire cute and dangerous cowboy to manage your mine and use them to fight on a 1 vs 1 battle.

~~~~~~~~~~
GAME FEATURES:
~~~~~~~~~~
Play With Facebook Friends
Challenge your friends on a 1 vs 1 duel with 5 rounds. Select carefully your cowboy !

League System
Compete against players of your league and rise higher to obtain more reward.
Win a battle and steal your opponent's resources.

Worldwide Arena
Battle against worldwide players, rise to the top and become the most powerful cowboy of the wild west!

Pick up your Gun
Discover hundreds of powerful guns with unique gameplay.
Use your gun to shoot on a duel vs other players.

Idle System
Use your cowboy to control your mine and collect ores while offline
Unlock more mines to win more ores
Discover rare mines to collect more precious ores
Hire more Cowboys to accelerate the production.

Craft and exchange
Your mine collect a ton of resources, use them to craft useful object and exchange them against useful items to improve your cowboy.
